STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetPlayer() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetPlayer():PlayerDataChest():Int_Get( PLAYER_UTILITY_COMPARTMENT_ID_PLAYER_NONARTIFACT_CHECK ) > 0 and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) == 0 and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) == 0)
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local filtered_obj = FilteredCard() if (filtered_obj ~= nil) then local characteristics = filtered_obj:GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_CANT_BE_PLAYED, 1 ) end end

local num_players = MTG():GetNumberOfPlayers() local filter = Object():GetFilter() for i=0,(num_players-1) do local player = MTG():GetNthPlayer( i ) if player:PlayerDataChest():Int_Get( PLAYER_UTILITY_COMPARTMENT_ID_PLAYER_NONARTIFACT_CHECK ) > 0 then player:AddBadge(PLAYER_BADGE_ICON_CHOSEN_PLAYER, "PLAYER_SET_CANT_CAST_NONARTIFACTS") end end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local num_players = MTG():GetNumberOfPlayers() for i=0,(num_players-1) do local player = MTG():GetNthPlayer( i ) if player ~= nil then player:PlayerDataChest():Int_Set( PLAYER_UTILITY_COMPARTMENT_ID_PLAYER_NONARTIFACT_CHECK, 0 ) end end
local trigger_player = TriggerObject():GetPlayer() if trigger_player ~= nil then trigger_player:PlayerDataChest():Int_Set( PLAYER_UTILITY_COMPARTMENT_ID_PLAYER_NONARTIFACT_CHECK, 1 ) end
